parameters.name: AuthKey
parameters.description: The AuthKey that is used to generate the MD5 signature in callbacks.

parameters.name: AutoTerminateDelay
parameters.description: The maximum latency at which the task is automatically stopped. Unit: seconds. Valid values: 1 to 10.

parameters.name: AutoTerminateEnabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to automatically stop the task when the latency exceeds the specified limit. Default value: false.

parameters.name: ChannelID
parameters.description:
The ID of the channel.

>  This parameter is required and takes effect only if you set the Mode parameter to rtc.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description:
The source language of the audio. Valid values:

*   ja: Japanese
*   yue: Cantonese
*   fspk: mixed Mandarin and English
*   en: English
*   cn: Mandarin

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: The type of the stream. Valid values: live and rtc. The value live specifies a regular live stream, such as a Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) stream.

parameters.name: ReportInterval
parameters.description:
The interval at which callbacks are returned. Unit: milliseconds. Valid values: -1 and 0 to 500.

*   \-1: accepts callbacks only for whole sentences, but not for incomplete sentences.
*   0 or an empty value: returns callbacks in real time.
*   A value that is greater than 0 and less than or equal to 500: returns callbacks at the specified interval.

parameters.name: RtcUserId
parameters.description:
The ID of the user who ingests the stream.

>  This parameter is required and takes effect only if you set the Mode parameter to rtc. You can specify only one user ID.

parameters.name: SDKAppID
parameters.description:
The ID of the ApsaraVideo Real-time Communication (ARTC) application.

>  This parameter is required and takes effect only if you set the Mode parameter to rtc.

parameters.name: StreamURL
parameters.description:
The URL of the live stream.

>  This parameter is required and takes effect only if you set the Mode parameter to live.

parameters.name: TargetLanguages
parameters.description:
The language into which the subtitles are translated. Valid values:

*   cn: Chinese
*   en: English
*   ja: Japanese

parameters.name: TranslateEnabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the translation feature.
